items.content_html: "VfyJS is a sophisticated JavaScript library crafted to fortify projects. Its lightweight design offers a comprehensive solution for seamless value validation, ensuring data integrity and empowering developers with an advanced platform to effortlessly address diverse validation tasks in their projects."

items.content_html: NodeSocket is a WebSocket application built with Node.js core modules. It enables real-time bidirectional communication between clients and servers over the WebSocket protocol. Easy to set up and use, NodeSocket provides a lightweight solution for implementing WebSocket functionality in your Node.js projects.
items.title: mohammednudman/NodeSocket: NodeSocket is a WebSocket application built with Node.js core modules. It enables real-time bidirectional communication between clients and servers over the WebSocket protocol. Easy to set up and use, NodeSocket provides a lightweight solution for implementing WebSocket functionality in your Node.js projects.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
